Detailed Description

Exception class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

flusspferd::exception::exception ( char const *  what,
std::string const &  type = "Error" 
)

Constructor.

If available, this constructor will create an exception containing the last Javascript engine error. Otherwise, it will create an exception of type type.

Parameters:
what The error message.
type The error type (if applicable).
flusspferd::exception::exception ( std::string const &  what,
std::string const &  type = "Error" 
)

Constructor.

If available, this constructor will create an exception containing the last Javascript engine error. Otherwise, it will create an exception of type type.

Parameters:
what The error message.
type The error type (if applicable).
flusspferd::exception::exception ( value const &  val  ) 

Value constructor.

Will create an exception containing val. If this propogates to javascript, it will be thrown as val directly.

Parameters:
val The value to stringify.
flusspferd::exception::exception ( boost::format const &  fmt,
std::string const &  type = "Error" 
)

Format constructor.

Will create an exception of type type from the given (completed) boost::format.

Parameters:
what The error message.
type The error type (if applicable).

bool flusspferd::exception::is_js_exception (  )  const

Will return true only if the exception contains an exception fetched from the underlying Javascript engine.

Returns:
Whether this exception is a JavaScript exception.
